means: 宣告…无罪，赦免…的罪行，宽恕…的罪行( absolve的过去式和过去分词 )
不受责难，免除责任 [义务] ,开脱（罪责）

sentence.Network_en: The President absolved his officers and took the blame upon himself.
sentence.Network_cn: 总统赦免了手下的官员，把过失揽到自己的头上。

sentence.Network_en: The court absolved him of all responsibility for the accident.
sentence.Network_cn: 法院宣告他对该事故不负任何责任。

sentence.Network_en: The court absolved him of guilt in her death.
sentence.Network_cn: 法庭赦免了他在她的死亡中所犯的罪.

PerfectNetExp.abs: he was absolved from his promise ., 他不必履行诺言了.

list.abs: This cannot absolve you from all responsibility ., 这并不能解除你的全部责任.
i absolve you from all your sins ., 我赦免你所有的罪过.
he cannot entirely absolve himself of the charge ., 他不能完全开脱掉这一指责.
"absolve"怎么说合适-翻译"absolve"-可可查词 ... absolve from 解除责任等; 赫免; absolve from responsibility 免除责任.
I absolve you from your vows ., 我解除你的誓约.
mediocrities everywhere , I absolve you .到处都是庸才。我赦免你们的罪。

entry.tran: 免除…的过失;解除…的责任
entry.def: If a report or investigation absolves someone from blame or responsibility, it formally states that he or she is not guilty or is not to blame.

example.ex: A police investigation yesterday absolved the police of all blame in the incident.
example.tran: 警方昨天的调查廓清了其在此事件中的任何责任。
宣告士兵们并无任何过失的调查

means.word_mean: 1. freed from any question of guilt;

sentences.sentence: "was now clear of the charge of cowardice"

auth_sentence.content: Thus absolved of his responsibility, he soon dies.
auth_sentence.res_content: Thus absolved of his responsibility, he soon dies.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Thus absolved of his responsibility, he soon dies.

auth_sentence.content: 'S absolved for godot of on religional condition.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: 'S absolved for godot of on religional condition.

auth_sentence.content: They are absolved even before they come home.
auth_sentence.res_content: They are absolved even before they come home.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: They are absolved even before they come home.
